798360.name: Sorcerer's Path Official Soundtrack
798360.description:
The official soundtrack of the game Sorcerer's Path! There are 20 tracks, which includes all the beautiful level themes and the exhilarating boss themes! Take a look at all these tracks!

1. Heartbeat of the Earth
2. Snow Blind
3. Dance of Death
4. Frozen History
5. Guardian Be Vanquished
6. The Creator
7. Scaling the Impossible
8. Echoeing Caverns
9. Still Sharp, My Friend
10. Beauty and Ash
11. Fire and Brimstone
12. Lonely Uptop; A Long Fall Down
13. Grass Ocean
14. The Path One Must Take
15. The Home of Darkness
16. Are You Able
17. Brotherly Love
18. This Must End
19. Quell the Dark To Restore The Order
20. The Path Home
